title: Mild annoyance
text: I’m usually mildly annoyed by small things, but I get over it. Hardest part about this app? Your actual friends’ posts are buried so deep by suggested posts or by accounts you follow with huge follower numbers that you have to manually seek out your friends’ stuff.

title: I’ve literally hated Instagram since Facebook bought it.
text: I built a personal account up from the ground up to 27K followers just posting my daily shenanigans. The second Facebook acquired IG and applied their algorithms I started bleeding followers noticing more spam activity, and way more toxic bot driven content. Down to 14K now I refuse to spend money on this platform out of principle and I have increasingly decreased my posts and engagement there because it just isn’t as fun or enjoyable to interact on the platform since the change of ownership.

title: Being limited to unfollowing?!
text:
Insta get it together!
The app has been glitchy and on top of that we have to constantly see ads and people we don’t care for. 
That being said today I tried unfollowing those I no longer speak to or care for. Yes there was a long list of pages I wanted to unfollow due to it being years since I last cleared it out. Y’all stopped me and ended up giving me MORE followers like if I wasn’t going to notice! 
STOP limiting us to how many pages we want to unfollow if you “care” so much for your users. 
Hope y’all can fix this small issue quickly. 
Thank you
